verbs.description: Less than two months away from his first statewide election , California Atty . Gen. Xavier Becerra [V: has] become adept not only at challenging President Trump but at using the bully pulpit of his office to raise his profile with voters .

[ARGM-TMP: Less than two months away from his first statewide election] , [ARG1: California Atty . Gen. Xavier Becerra] has [V: become] [ARG2: adept not only at challenging President Trump but at using the bully pulpit of his office to raise his profile with voters] .

Less than two months away from his first statewide election , California Atty . Gen. Xavier Becerra has become adept not only at challenging President Trump but at [V: using] [ARG1: the bully pulpit of his office] [ARG2: to raise his profile with voters] .

Less than two months away from his first statewide election , California Atty . Gen. Xavier Becerra has become adept not only at challenging President Trump but at using the bully pulpit of his office to [V: raise] [ARG1: his profile] [ARGM-LOC: with voters] .
